name: ServUS Tech
description:
Servus Tech is resourceful Eastern Europe outsourcing and IT services company specialized in custom software development. We are based in Romania, however we are seasoned in working with international partners, including the USA and several EU clients from Sweden, the United Kingdom, Denmark and Germany. 

We provide various services, such as onsite and remote software development, onsite and remote software maintenance, IT consulting, IT project management or automation testing and quality assurance.
